name: Temple Tourist
description:
Hi! 

My name is Lenn, I'm a game design student at Luca School of Arts and for my final project we had to make a puzzle game. And so 'Temple Tourist' was born. 

The story: You are a brave explorer looking for the treasure deep inside a mysterious temple. You're only allowed to use a handfull of tools and a rubber ball. You use the tools to make a clear path for your ball to reach the exit portal. Once you reached the portal, you go to the next level. When you successfully completed all the levels you find the 'treasure' and finnish the game.

(The treasure at the end is the joy and knowledge you gained after finishing all the levels ;) )
